name: JoyceMeyer
0:
”Alexa, tell Joyce Meyer I want to listen to today's daily devotional”
”Alexa, tell Joyce Meyer I would like to listen to enjoying everyday life”
”Alexa, ask Joyce Meyer to play today's everyday moments”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joyce meyer
Developer Terms of Use
des: New York Times bestselling author Joyce Meyer uses examples from her life and the Bible to teach humorous and easy-to-understand lessons on how to conquer life’s problems. Find encouragement each day with: the Daily Devotional; Enjoying Everyday Life broadcasts; and, the 90-second Everyday Moments segments. You’ll find inspiration, insight and motivation from Joyce’s teaching and God’s word for your everyday life.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
